events.message: I received my laptop yesterday and unfortunately the screen has a large scratch that wasn't mentioned anywhere.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect related to a screen scratch upon delivery.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the case regarding the scratched laptop screen.
Hello, I’m John from support. Sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and confirm if the device is still functional?
I have attached pictures showing the scratch. The laptop powers on but the scratch is very noticeable and bothersome.
Thank you for the photos. We can arrange a replacement unit to be sent to you at no extra cost or offer a partial refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, thank you. Please let me know how quickly it can be shipped.
We will arrange the replacement to be shipped out within 2 business days and provide you with tracking information.
The replacement order has been processed and the shipment details will be sent to you shortly. Thank you for your patience.
We just wanted to follow up and ensure the replacement laptop arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday without any issues. The screen is perfect now, thank you for the quick help!
We are closing this case now as the issue has been resolved successfully. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
You will receive a brief satisfaction survey shortly. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
